name: @grifortis/schiavinato-validator
description: Interactive browser-based validator and testing tool for Schiavinato Sharing - human-executable secret sharing for BIP39 mnemonics

scripts.test: echo "Validator is a standalone HTML tool. Open JS_Library_Validator.html in a browser to test."
scripts.verify: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const html=fs.readFileSync('JS_Library_Validator.html','utf8'); const needle='JS Library Validator v'+pkg.version; if(!html.includes(needle)) throw new Error('Version mismatch in HTML: expected '+needle); console.log('âœ“ Version verified:', pkg.version);"
